page.title: 05FOOTBALL AND HOLIDAYS
page.content: We play football at primary school and we have a good team.This is our team:{Gareth Marc Glenn(Captain) {Wayne Jason Robert Cain The best players are {WAYNE}and{CAIN}. ______________________________________ We are going to BUTLINS.Me and my brothers and sister got out of bed at 6.O o'clock and we left home at 8.o' clock. We got to BUTLINS at 9.20 am and we put our car in the car park. When we went into BUTLINS we put our clothes in the chalet.Then me and my Dad went on the chair lift and my Mum went on the little train to meet me and my Dad.Then we went swimming and when we got out of the swimming pool we had some dinner.After we finshed our dinner we went on the bumper cars and then we went on some little rides with my baby brother then we went back to our chalet.
